page.title: 04Gunton Estate Farms
page.content: The Gunton estate which in early 19th century extended to 17,000 acres (including the holiday resort of Cromer) and all the farms in the surrounding villages had been reduced to a mere 2,000 acres when it was sold in 1980. All the farms are now privately owned Cottages having been sold or let at very low rents to estate workers,many of whom have lived there all their lives. There are building restrictions on many of these. Most have been restored and modernised but a few remain in the original state. The old Rectory has been converted to four dwellings. Farm buildings,particulaily barns are increasingly being converted to exclusive residential properties for use by city workers and retired people.
